Detailed Description

Internal abstraction of an OPP client operation.

Warning;
This is an internal interface and must not be used outside APOXI OBEX at all.

Its purpose is to provide an abstraction of an OPP command (PUSH /PULL) to permit queuing and deferred execution of OPP operations when the OBEX client implementing the OPP profile is temporarily busy with another operation.
